summary: A command‑line script that orchestrates the fine‑tuning of the Stable Diffusion InstructPix2Pix model with LoRA adapters. It parses configuration options, loads and preprocesses image‑instruction datasets, sets up the diffusion pipeline, runs a distributed training loop using Accelerate, logs progress (optionally to Weights & Biases), saves checkpoints, and pushes the resulting model to the Hugging Face Hub.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use tool for developers and researchers to customize the InstructPix2Pix image‑editing diffusion model on proprietary data, enabling tailored image‑to‑image generation capabilities for commercial products or research projects.
